name: Hard Reset (itch)
description:
A platformer game about repairing the game itself. After the game "crashes", the character has to find objects to repair the game and add back the core mechanics. *If you see the blue screen of death, DON'T PANIC. Regular Xbox controls, A to jump, X to dash. On the keyboard, use WASD or arrows, shift to dash and space to jump

Rémi Martel
William Fournier
Guillaume Proulx
Julien Codsi
Dat-Phi Tran
Yanick Bélanger
